name: Android Kernel with eXtendable UDP
short_description:
eXtendable UDP (XUDP) is perfectly backward-compatible with ordinary UDP and support UDP flow continuity over vertical handovers. XUDP for android exploits concurrent connectivities of multiple radio interfaces (e.g. WFi/3G/4G) so that UDP stream can be continued even if one of these interfaces is disabled.

Current uploaded code is for Android platform
Target device: Nexus one (HTC)
Platform version: Froyo
Kernel version: 2.6.36.4

More description  will be soon.
summary: eXtendable UDP is for UDP flow continuity over vertical handovers
